page.title: 05Farm Machinery
page.content: To find out what machinery is needed to run a mixed farm in 1985,we visited Mr.Miller,the manager of the Tregear estate. Mr.Miller has the following machinery:a{combine,four tractors}(one for spraying weeds,two big tractors for pulling,and a tractor for just going around the farms and cutting the grass that the sheep leave)and a fork lift truck for lifting the bales. They do their own repairs on the machinery.The{fork lift}is driven by oil and all the engine does is drive the oil around the machine so if something goes wrong with it they take it back to the garage.With one of the tractors they take off the big back wheels and put on the thin wheels for spraying weeds.It has very thin wheels so it can go down the tram lines with out damaging the crops.
